amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into contracts with incorporated entities whose sealed bid or competitive proposal shows that the entity is incorporated or chartered in Bermuda or the Cayman Islands and previously incorporated in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into contracts with incorporated entities whose sealed bid or competitive proposal shows that the entity is incorporated or chartered in Bermuda or the Cayman Islands and previously incorporated in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
